milestones.title: SheSharp New in Tech Scholarship Recipient
milestones.description: Won for being an active participant in SheSharp.

milestones.title: Blog post got chosen as the Community Pick on daily.dev
milestones.description: I noticed that the descriptions of frontend dev tools are not talked about enough in the open source, so I decided to focus on this topic to start the conversation. Additionally, I found that using the Fantastic Four as symbols for each tool would make it easier for beginners, especially those who come from a non-tech background, to understand how they can use them in their open source journey.

milestones.title: Winner of CoCode's February Blog-A-Thon
milestones.description: For this event, I wrote about how developers can increase their productivity during the DevOps process.

milestones.title: Article posted on the Open Source Squad on daily.dev
